overview: As spring makes way for summer a group of young, curious adolescent girls share innocent experiences none of them will forget.  Like flowers coming into bloom, the fresh warm bodies of six beautiful girls are set to blossom as each has her first lesbian experience.  Pink nipples are embraced by moist lips, virgin kisses are shared, and ripe young pussy is parted, the aroma of innocent nectar drifts out and the rich flavour devoured.
title: Summer Camp Secrets
